title: 也不出crash-reports的报告就蹦了
author: Dou_Bi_
txt_content:
很莫名看了说是区块加载什么的








崩溃报告.txt


2020-7-16 12:28 上传
点击文件名下载附件




22.4 KB, 下载次数: 7

replies.author: zycdojar
replies.txt_content:
就是服务器tick一段时间没刷新。
原因是这段[12:17:45 ERROR]: The server has stopped responding!
[12:17:45 ERROR]: Please report this to https://github.com/MinecraftPortCentral/Cauldron/issues
[12:17:45 ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports
[12:17:45 ERROR]: Cauldron version: 1710-dev-4-B210 (MC: 1.7.10)
[12:17:45 ERROR]: The server is going slow. Last server tick was 97251ms ago
[12:17:45 ERROR]: Last Tick: 1594872968000 Current Time: 1594873065251 Warning: 30000 Timeout: 90000
[12:17:45 ERROR]: [TPS]: 20.0 Server Tick #737254
[12:17:45 ERROR]: Last recorded TPS: 20.0复制代码
mc游戏记录时间是用tick，然鹅上一个tick是在97秒前，服务器运行速度太慢了。
前面全都是无关紧要的警告。
后面是把崩溃时的系统状态输出（加载了多少区块，运行了多少线程）。
最后
[12:17:56 INFO]: Startup script './start.sh' does not exist! Stopping server.
[12:17:56 INFO]: Java has been asked to exit (code 0) by cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.exitJava(FMLCommonHandler.java:636).
[12:17:56 INFO]: If this was an unexpected exit, use -Dfml.debugExit=true as a JVM argument to find out where it was called
[12:17:56 INFO]: Stopping server复制代码
服务器试图重启以解决问题，结果默认启动文件（start.sh）不存在。
总的来说要么是服务器配置太低了，要么是加载的区块有让服务器卡的东西。

replies.author: Dou_Bi_
replies.txt_content:
zycdojar 发表于 2020-7-16 12:30

原因是这段

所以说是需要加内存还是核

所以说是需要加内存还是核
得看服务器所消耗的内存和cpu的图，然后行动
